==== Checkout from the source ====
First, make sure you have bazaar.
On Ubuntu or Debian:
## <code>sudo apt-get update</code>
## <code>sudo apt-get install bzr</code>

Then:

## Start in your home directory: <code>cd ~</code>
## Create a Projects directory: <code>mkdir Projects</code>
## Change to the Projects directory: <code>cd Projects/</code>
## Check out the gasp source code from the bzr repository on launchpad:
   {{{
     bzr branch http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~gasp-dev/gasp/gasp-dev
   }}}
## Return to your home directory: <code>cd ~</code>
## Make a <code>lib/python</code> directory in your home directory for your own python libraries: {{{
   mkdir lib
   mkdir lib/python
  }}}
  0. Add PYTHONPATH to ~/.bashrc:
*** vi ~/.bashrc
*** add the following lines to the bottom of the file: {{{
PYTHONPATH=$HOME/lib/python
export PYTHONPATH
    }}}
  0. Now make a symlink from lib/python to the gasp source code:
*** <code>cd lib/python</code>
*** <code>ln -s ~/Projects/gasp-dev/gasp gasp</code>

==== Update GASP ====
To update GASP:
{{{
cd ~/Projects/gasp-dev
bzr pull}}}
